name: Best Friends Forever Returns
desc: Its a two player event which tests your friendship level with various indoor and outdoor games and activities.

name: Paintball
desc: A paintball event will be held in the throwball court in GJB.

name: Cooking without fire
desc: Contestants have to prepare dishes without using fire or any means of cooking. Innovative abd tastiest of dishes win the contest. Attractive presentation can gain you more points.

name: Selfie of the day
desc: Take a selfie with as many number of people and show it to us and win exciting prizes.

name: Roll the dice and win a prize
desc: Try your luck at guessing the probabilty of what may be the outcome of the roll of a dice. Prize guarenteed for every registered user.

name: Intensity
desc: Its a laser shooting game where player shoots at the light indication on the goal. It has both single and multiplayer options.

name: Pirates smugglers
desc: Its a game specially designed to give gamers a awesome experience of being smugglers. They have to be smart, alert and quick in their decesions in order to break into the vault and rob off all the treasure.

name: Game of thrones
desc: A scavenging hunt on the theme of game of thrones. It consists of two rounds.

name: Lovemeter
desc: It is a wire loop game with some modifications.
